channel.title: Ok please help me with this easy litle thing.. Is it so hard? takes you 1 min!
channel.description:
I need to know how do i add more xp to peps. When peps att npc they get xp . And i want to make it give you mroe xp to str att def.! HELP
Bloop[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 09:43:40 AM[/size][hr]7 views .. no replies.. well i see no one is smart enough to help..!! comeone gyes!!

item.source: Ok please help me with this easy litle thing.. Is it so hard? takes you 1 min!

item.title: Ok please help me with this easy litle thing.. Is it so hard? takes you 1 min!
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Go to your attackNPC boolean and scroll down a bit.
You’ll see

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 7; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType); }
Change the numbers in those to experience rate per hit depending on fight type.

Read full topic
